name: Button
description: A Button indicates a possible user action.

props.name: Button.Content
props.description: Used in some Button types, such as `animated`.

name: Container
description: A container limits content to a maximum width.

name: Divider
description: A divider visually segments content into groups.

name: Flag
description: A flag is is used to represent a political state.

name: Header
description: A header provides a short summary of content

props.name: Header.Content
props.description: Header content wraps the main content when there is an adjacent Icon or Image.

name: Icon
description: An icon is a glyph used to represent something else.

props.name: Icon.Group
props.description: Several icons can be used together as a group.

name: Image
description: An image is a graphic representation of something.

name: Input
description: An Input is a field used to elicit a response from a user.

props.name: List.Content
props.description: A list item can contain a content.

props.name: List.Description
props.description: A list item can contain a description.

props.name: List.Header
props.description: A list item can contain a header.

props.name: List.Icon
props.description: A list item can contain an icon.

props.name: List.Item
props.description: A list item can contain a set of items.

props.name: List.List
props.description: A list can contain a sub list.

name: Loader
description: A loader alerts a user to wait for an activity to complete.

name: Rail
description: A rail is used to show accompanying content outside the bound

name: Reveal
description: A reveal displays additional content in place of previous content when activated.

props.name: Reveal.Content
props.description: A content sub-component for the Reveal.

name: Segment
description: A segment is used to create a grouping of related content.

props.name: Segment.Group
props.description: A group of segments can be formatted to appear together.

name: Step
description: A step shows the completion status of an activity in a series of activities.

props.name: Step.Content
props.description: A step can contain a content.

props.name: Step.Title
props.description: A step can contain a title.
